languages.text: "Откуда тут арбитру взяться? Они на аванпосту окопались, а эти со свалки вылезли. Пусть Вальц разберется, он чует фальшивки".
"Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."
languages.original_text: "Откуда тут арбитру взяться? Они на аванпосту окопались, а эти со свалки вылезли. Пусть Вальц разберется, он чует фальшивки".

traits.locale_text: "Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."
"Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."

"Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."

languages.text: «¿Por qué iba venir un Arbitrator aquí? Están todos bien refugiados en el puesto, y esta panda ha salido del vertedero. Walz se encargará de ellos; sabe identificar a los farsantes».
languages.original_text: "Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué iba venir un Arbitrator aquí? Están todos bien refugiados en el puesto, y esta panda ha salido del vertedero. Walz se encargará de ellos; sabe identificar a los farsantes».

languages.text: “法务官怎么会跑到这种地方来？那些法务官都躲在哨站里，这些人是从垃圾堆里爬出来的。交给沃尔茨处理就好了，他一眼就能认出冒牌货。”
languages.original_text: "Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."

traits.locale_text: “法务官怎么会跑到这种地方来？那些法务官都躲在哨站里，这些人是从垃圾堆里爬出来的。交给沃尔茨处理就好了，他一眼就能认出冒牌货。”

languages.text: 「なんでアービトレイターがここにいるんだ？全員、前哨基地に引きこもっていたのが、這いずり出てきやがった。ワルツが奴らに対処するだろう―あいつは嘘くさいがな」
languages.original_text: "Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."

traits.locale_text: 「なんでアービトレイターがここにいるんだ？全員、前哨基地に引きこもっていたのが、這いずり出てきやがった。ワルツが奴らに対処するだろう―あいつは嘘くさいがな」

languages.text: "Was hätte ein Arbitrator hier zu schaffen? Die sitzen alle in ihrem Außenposten fest, und diese Typen kamen aus dem Dreck gekrochen. Walz kümmert sich um sie ... er erkennt jeden Schwindel."
languages.original_text: "Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."

traits.locale_text: "Was hätte ein Arbitrator hier zu schaffen? Die sitzen alle in ihrem Außenposten fest, und diese Typen kamen aus dem Dreck gekrochen. Walz kümmert sich um sie ... er erkennt jeden Schwindel."

languages.text: « Qu'est qu'un arbitrator viendrait fiche ici ? Ils sont tous planqués dans leur avant-poste, et ceux-là ont surgi de nulle part. Walz va s'occuper de leur cas, il flairerait une imposture à des lieues à la ronde. »
languages.original_text: "Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est qu'un arbitrator viendrait fiche ici ? Ils sont tous planqués dans leur avant-poste, et ceux-là ont surgi de nulle part. Walz va s'occuper de leur cas, il flairerait une imposture à des lieues à la ronde. »

languages.text: "Bir Yargıcı neden buraya gelsin? Hepsi karakolda saklanıyor. Bunlar da sürünerek çıkmış. Walz onlarla ilgilenir, kimin numara yapıp yapmadığını anında anlar."
languages.original_text: "Why would an Arbitrator be here? They're all holed up in their outpost, and this bunch has crawled out of the dump. Walz will deal with them — he can smell a fake."

traits.locale_text: "Bir Yargıcı neden buraya gelsin? Hepsi karakolda saklanıyor. Bunlar da sürünerek çıkmış. Walz onlarla ilgilenir, kimin numara yapıp yapmadığını anında anlar."
